name: SPREAD (WoodlyJameson, and1pandi)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move

LEFT CLICK to shoot

ESCAPE to quit

F11 to toggle full screen

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

This game was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. This means the game was made in two days. The theme was "Out Of Control." This game relates to that theme by having a mechanic called SPREAD which is uncontrollable without help.  All assets were created during the jam except for the gunshot sounds.

CREDITS:

WoodlyJameson: programming, sound design

andipandi: artwork, sound design

J.D. Mazzatenta: music

OTHER SOURCES:

fonts: https://www.1001fonts.com/pixel-fonts.html
